titles.title: Health Savings for Families Act of 2023
Health Savings for Families Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow contributions to a health savings account when a spouse has a health flexible spending account.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Health Savings for Families Act of 2023
This bill permits contributions to health savings accounts by individuals whose spouses have health flexible spending accounts.
